An ancient heirloom of some sort Curved Sword Talisman Enhances guard counters A talisman depicting a curved sword and a swordsman Dragonfire Incantation Transforms caster into a dragon to spew flaming breath. Charging extends duration Aspects of the Crucible: Tail Incantation Creates a supple tail that sweeps through foes before the caster. Charging enhances potency Dragonmaw Incantation Transforms caster into a dragon to bite enemies before them Dragonclaw Incantation Transforms caster into a dragon to tear through foes with dragon claws. Allows one follow-up attack Ash-of-War Scarab Gray scarab worn directly on the head. These scarabs roll clumps of Ashes of War during their labors Pumpkin Helm An oval helm large enough to cover any head. Very heavy and very hard Scaled Helm Helm worn by Old Knight Istvan. The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it highly effective against non-physical attacks Commoner Headband A headband that holds cloth in place. Standard wear for commoners of the Lands Between Blue Cloth Cowl Cowl of a nomadic warrior. The blue color of its fabric symbolizes brisk waters, as fluid and flowing as the sword in the hand of its wearer Twinned Helm The two known as D are inseparable twins. They are two bodies and two minds, but a single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another Imp Head (Cat) Head covering made from the largely unaltered head of an impish golem Sage Hood A burgundy pointed hood. Attire of the wise sages who were deemed heretical Dagger A standard dagger with a straight blade Golden Halberd Weighty halberd forged of gold. Wielded by the Order of Tree Sentinels, heavily equipped knights. Deals holy damage Reduvia Jagged dagger with a distinctive curved blade. Used by the noble servants of the Lord of Blood Erdsteel Dagger An erdsteel dagger with a grass crest engraved upon its blade. Carried by the Erdtree royalty for self-defense in times of peace Bloodhound Fang Curved greatsword with a gently undulating blade wielded by Bloodhound Knights Estoc Large piercing sword with a long, hard bladed edge which is also capable of slashing attacks Warpick Great hammer with a hard protruding beak. A pickaxe designed for combat, in essence Greataxe Greataxe akin to a huge lump of iron. Recognized as the weapon of choice of badland chieftains Uchigatana A katana with a long single-edged curved blade. A unique weapon wielded by the samurai from the Land of Reeds Shamshir Curved sword with a thin blade of ample length. Light of weight despite its larger size, its slicing attacks come in rapid succession Short Spear An exceedingly plain spear of modest weight Spear Weapon comprised of a blade attached to a long shaft Lordsworn Greatsword Well-crafted straight sword with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord army Falchion A curved sword with a single-sided blade. Delivers slashing attacks with its sharp blade, but is ineffective against thick armor and hides covered in tough scales Battle Hammer Large iron great hammer designed for gladiatorial combat. Used by duelists who were exiled from the colosseum Erdtree Greatbow Greatbow featuring Erdtree styling.
